text: hi everyone my name is maja trainer from
the master today I want to share with
you guys about me and my experiences
working at langmaster I graduated from
national economics university four years
ago with an excellent degree and I have
been working at langmaster since then as
the first generation teacher at
langmaster I have been so lucky to work
with so many students more than 50
classes
107 ours and more than 5000 students
that have been taught when I teach I
don't just focus on the knowledge or the
method for the students because I know
knowledge and method are just 20% of
success so I focus more on psychology I
understand that the most important thing
that makes my students improve is the
motivation to study English they cannot
learn without understanding how
important English is and why they have
to study hard so I helped them realize
it and inspire them to study that's why
I have seen many of my students growing
day by day and changing to be much
better learners after the course I'm so
happy about that moreover I have great
co-workers at langmaster they are so
energetic
productive and at the same time they are
so friendly and helpful I feel so lucky
to have this environment to work in if
you're looking for a professional place
to study English or even to work I
highly recommend you to come to the
master thank you for listening bye bye
